name: Archer Defence
description:
Archer Defence is a small game developed in Construct 3 for android devices. You control an archer, as he stands atop a castle wall. Using simple swipe and tap gestures, you fire arrows at the enemy soldiers climbing up the castle wall. As soon as an enemy makes it to the top of the wall, it's game over.

Earn coins by defeating enemies. The more enemies defeated in a game, the more coins you are awarded. These coins can be used to upgrade your skills, allowing you to fire arrows more quickly. This game will be entirely free to play and will have no in-app purchases whatsoever.

Archer Defence is available to download from the Google Play Store. Search for 'Archer Defence' or tap the Google Play image below.

Sound Effects sourced from zapsplat.com

Music - Good Morning Doctor Weird by Eric Matyas, at soundimage.org
